snippet: A month after the Justice Department had threatened to sue block the deal, 3M announced on Wednesday that it was terminating its agreement with Avery Dennison to buy its office and consumer products business for $550 million in cash.
abstract: A month after the Justice Department had threatened to sue block the deal, 3M announced on Wednesday that it was terminating its agreement with Avery Dennison to buy its office and consumer products business for $550 million in cash.

headline.main: 3M Abandons Deal to Buy Avery Dennison Unit
